thread.title: Safe Containing 40K Stolen From Home In Westmoreland Co.
thread.title_full: Safe Containing 40K Stolen From Home In Westmoreland Co.

author: CBS Pittsburgh
title: Safe Containing 40K Stolen From Home In Westmoreland Co.
text:
Safe Containing 40K Stolen From Home In Westmoreland Co. December 31, 2016 7:25 AM Filed Under: Latrobe , Westmoreland County , White Fences Lane (Photo Credit: Thinkstock) 
LATROBE (KDKA) â€” A burglar made off with more than $40,000 after breaking into a home in Westmoreland County. 
It happened the evening of Dec. 16 at a home on White Fences Lane in Latrobe. 
Police say the suspect broke into the basement of the 60-year-old victim. 
A black Sentry safe containing $40,800 in cash and silver coins.
